title: Quickly
explanationEnUs: Adverbs of manner usually describe how something happens.
explanationZhTw: 情態副詞通常描述事情如何發生。
explanationZhCn: 情态副词通常描述事情如何发生。

title: Eat
explanationEnUs: Frequency adverbs usually go before the main verb.
explanationZhTw: 頻率副詞通常放在主要動詞之前。
explanationZhCn: 频率副词通常放在主要动词之前。

title: Quietly
explanationEnUs: Use an adverb to modify the verb 'speak'.

title: Goe
content: She [never goes|goes never] to bed late.
explanationEnUs: 'Never' is placed before the main verb.

title: Usually
explanationZhTw: 頻率副詞放在 'be' 動詞之後。
explanationZhCn: 频率副词放在 'be' 动词之后。

title: Works
explanationEnUs: Use 'very' to intensify an adjective or adverb.
explanationZhTw: 使用 'very' 加強形容詞或副詞的語氣。
explanationZhCn: 使用 'very' 加强形容词或副词的语气。

title: Quite
explanationEnUs: 'Quite' is an adverb of degree. 'Quiet' is an adjective.
explanationZhTw: 'Quite' 是程度副詞。'Quiet' 是形容詞。
explanationZhCn: 'Quite' 是程度副词。'Quiet' 是形容词。

title: Hard
explanationEnUs: 'Hard' is both adjective and adverb. 'Hardly' means 'almost not'.
explanationZhTw: 'Hard' 既是形容詞也是副詞。'Hardly' 意指「幾乎不」。
explanationZhCn: 'Hard' 既是形容词也是副词。'Hardly' 意指「几乎不」。

title: High
content: The bird flew [high|highly] in the sky.
explanationEnUs: 'High' is the adverb for physical height.
explanationZhTw: 'High' 是表示物理高度的副詞。
explanationZhCn: 'High' 是表示物理高度的副词。

title: Rarely
content: I [have rarely|rarely have] seen such a thing.
explanationEnUs: Place the adverb between the auxiliary and main verb.
explanationZhTw: 將副詞放在助動詞和主要動詞之間。
explanationZhCn: 将副词放在助动词和主要动词之间。
